Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

hueFolderBG Gives the Opportunity to Get Custom Colors and Even More Options for your Folders Background and your Titles Inside!

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak and its options.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.6 - Added the option to Hide the Outside Folders Views. - Added the option to Hide the Folders Labels and Titles. - Added the option to Enable the 2X2 Grid Folders Thumbnails. - Code Changes/Improvements. - Updated Prefs Descriptions. Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Make the Folders Only Show the Labels View on the SpringBoard (Integration of my Tweak OnlyLabelForFolder available on my Repository).
Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Make the Apps Stay in the Same Page Background Position when you Leave the Folder without Scrolling to the First Page (Integration of my Tweak AppInFolderStayTheSame available on my Repository). Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to Disable the Exit Folder Taping.
